title: Hosidius mine

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Hosidius mine is located west of the Tithe farm and north of Crabclaw Isle. It is a medium-sized mine, containing a variety of low-level ores. There is a bronze pickaxe spawn located just north of the mine in the ruins of an abandoned building.

content:
Hosidius mine
Released7 January 2016 (Update)
MembersYes
LocationWest of Tithe farm
Map
Advanced data
Typemine

The Hosidius mine is located west of the Tithe farm and north of Crabclaw Isle. It is a medium-sized mine, containing a variety of low-level ores. There is a bronze pickaxe spawn located just north of the mine in the ruins of an abandoned building.
